function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Handling of wastewater samples may lead to exposure to potentially infectious material, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases to laboratory personnel and others in the vicinity.","Mitigation":"Use appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE) and follow standard biosafety protocols for handling potentially infectious material.","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, autoclaves, and chemical disinfectants for decontamination.","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers, and maintenance staff.","Owner":"Laboratory management, biosafety officers, and research supervisors."},{"Description":"Inadequate decontamination of equipment and work surfaces may lead to the persistence of infectious material, posing a risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Continued exposure to infectious material, increasing the likelihood of disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Implement thorough decontamination procedures using appropriate disinfectants and regular cleaning schedules.","Technologies":"Chemical disinfectants, autoclaves, and UV germicidal irradiation.","People":"Laboratory personnel, cleaning staff, and maintenance personnel.","Owner":"Facility management, laboratory management, and biosafety officers."},{"Description":"Improper handling and disposal of used pipettes and other laboratory equipment may lead to contamination and potential spread of infectious material.","Impact":"Risk of contamination of the environment and potential exposure of individuals to infectious material.","Mitigation":"Implement proper waste management protocols, use designated waste disposal containers, and provide training on safe handling and disposal of laboratory equipment.","Technologies":"Autoclaves, chemical disinfectants, and designated waste disposal containers.","People":"Laboratory personnel, waste management staff, and maintenance personnel.","Owner":"Laboratory management, waste management coordinators, and biosafety officers."}]}
